name: Esphion
overview: Esphion Limited provides proactive security solutions to telecommunications, corporate, and government customers in the Asia Pacific. It offers appliances and solutions for network disaster protection. The companyâ€™s appliances include Esphion EX and SP appliances that detect network anomalies and threats, such as denial of service attacks, insider attacks, violations of internal policies, network mis-configurations, worm outbreaks, and other unseen and unknown threats. It also provides Esphion EX3000 and Esphion SP5000 that incorporate the Esphion controllers and the intelligent neural agents in a single system used in stand-alone systems of enterprises and service providers; and Esphion EX3000c and Esphion SP5000c controllers, and a number of Esphion EX3000i and Esphion SP5000i intelligent neural agents used in distributed systems of enterprises and service providers. The company serves enterprises, carriers, and service providers. It has sales operations in the Asia Pacific, Europe, and the United States. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Auckland, New Zealand. As of January 8, 2008, Esphion Limited operates as a subsidiary of Allot Communications Ltd.
